name:
Gold Acid Unicorn
Men's Tank Top
description:
Men's Black Tank Top

Relaxed, easy fit, this tank top is essential to your active, warm weather look. 6-ounce, 100% cotton (preshrunk), banded neck and armholes, finished with a double-needle hem. Available in size Small-XL. Click for measurements


Gold Acid Design

The Gold Acid logo is printed with metallic gold shimmer ink. The foreground, graphic is a full size halftone image of a teenage girl riding the magical white Unicorn of Legend.

name:
'NuSkool Addiction' Acid House T-Shirt
White, ring-spun cotton
description:
"NuSkool Addiction" Acid House T-Shirt

Printed by hand on one of our Acid Unicorn® ΓΔVΣ® t-shirts. Our signature brand, white t-shirt. Super soft, ring spun, pre-shrunk, fitted and comfortable. These t-shirts are the truth.
The 3 color screen print uses vibrant red, metallic gold, and black water based inks. These colors are not affected by UV light, but the white t-shirt alone, will light-up at a rave or nightclub. This shirt has been described by many as "ill," "dope," "fresh as f**k," and "...probably the coolest Acid House t-shirt ever made..." #1 #AcidHouse #tshirt

Now available in size Small-XL only. Click here for measurements.

name:
Acid Unicorn® Rave Pack
Adjustable Straps
description: 14"x18" non-woven polypropylene backpack with adjustable drawstrings, cinch to fit your needs.

name:
American ΓΔVΣ® Girl
PinkAcid™ CropTop
description: Neon American Apparel cotton/poly unisex tank top. I cropped each one, and finished the hems with my PFAFF 1222E sewing machine.

name:
Neon ΓΔVΣ® Crop Top
Girl's Acid Yellow
description:
Acid Yellow CropTop

Large ΓΔVΣ® logo across the bust. This crop-top design has a sporty, athletic feel with it's simple, horizontal line gradient. The black ΓΔVΣ design is screen printed by hand with water based ink. Extra soft, flexible and will never crack or peel. Preshrunk %60 Cotton 40% Polyester.

Fit

These crop-tops are converted racerback tanks. The are nicely fitted in the shoulders, with a scoop neckline. Flowy, relaxed fit at the bottom hem. Click to view measurements

name:
Maui Surf on Acid
Men's Neon T-Shirt+Tank
description:
Surf on Acid T-Shirt

Acid Unicorn® signature ΓΔVΣ® t-shirt in white. Extra soft, ring spun, pre-shrunk, fitted and comfortable. These t-shirts are the very best.
The 5 color screen print consists of bright, neon green, fluorescent pink, glow blue, neon yellow, and black water based inks. These colors are extremely affected by UV light, but the white t-shirt alone, will light-up at any rave or nightclub.

Click here for measurements.

Surf on Acid Tank

Relaxed, easy fit, this tank top is essential to your active, warm weather look. 6-ounce, 100% cotton (preshrunk), banded neck and armholes, finished with a double-needle hem.
Click here for measurements.


Design notes—
This is an Acid Unicorn® homage to global surf culture. Unlike the owners of large corporations, who don't surf, we at Acid Unicorn® like to practice what we preach.

name:

Men's XL
description: Men's clothing, black tank top with white Acid Unicorn ΓΔVΣ® design. Formerly titled "Acid Techno Unicorn Tank." 100% Cotton, only one size XL available. Click to view measurements

name:
ΓΔVΣ® Logo NewEra® Snapback
Black+White
description:
Fancy

9FIFTY Snapback

The very popular New Era® Snapback. made of 100% cotton, woven adjustable, structured, high crown, normal bill. Black ΓΔVΣ® Logo is displayed in 2.5" white felt letters, stitched in white tread.

The Design
ΓΔVΣ® is a trademark of Acid Unicorn®. Hand cut from 2 layers of polyester felt and machine stitched by the designer. The polyester felt is made from 100% recycled post-consumer plastic bottles.

NOTE:

The color options included for black, grey, and white combinations are in the following format: "HAT COLOR/LETTER COLOR"


These NewEra® ΓΔVΣ® hats are genuine products. Please allow 7-10 business days for delivery.

name:
ΓΔVΣ® Nation Sweatpants
Black+Neon Green
description:
Please Dance in These Pants

The ΓΔVΣ® Collection, by Acid Unicorn®, is our original line of dancewear. Unisex adult size sweatpants (see measurements) work great for all B-Boys, B-Girls, performance dancers, Hip-Hop, ballet, twerkin, jerkin, or any kind of body werkin that cause you to sweat. The oversized logo is screen printed in wight and neon green, with a line gradient halftone fill pattern. I only use the brightest fluorescent ink to make my neon ΓΔVΣ t-shirts, tank tops, and fleeces. For more on this topic, please visit our blog.

The Sweatpants—
Adult Unisex black sweatpant with pockets
White and neon green print
Regular fit
Shown in size medium
Please allow 7-10 business days.

Click here for measurements.

name:
ΓΔVΣ® Logo NewEra® Snapback
Purple+Neon Green
description:
9FIFTY Snapback

The very popular New Era® Snapback. Made of 100% Cotton, Woven Adjustable, Structured, High Crown, Normal Bill. The hand tailored ΓΔVΣ® Logo appliqué, is made from the highest quality hat maker's felt available. Unlike traditional felt, made from wool or animal fur, I use polyester felt made from recycled post-consumer plastic bottles.


The Varsity ΓΔVΣ® Patch

ΓΔVΣ® is an original, trademark brand by Acid Unicorn®.

The letterman style felt appliqué are constructed individually by the designer. The ΓΔVΣ® logo outlines are machine-stitched and cut from two layers of high-density hat maker's felt. All neon, and non-neon hats, are embellished by hand, by the designer.
Please allow 7-10 business days.

name:
Neon ΓΔVΣ® Unicorn Tank Top
Neon Pink
description:
Acid Unicorn® ΓΔVΣ® Tank Top

Neon Pink w/Black Rave Design. The image shows the powerful Black Techno Unicorn, charging into the future of ΓΔVΣ®. Printed in black on a UV reactive, flowy racerback tank. Our semi-fitted tank is soft, comfortable— and ultra bright. The perfect everyday accent layer. Tailored details give this premium tank top a feminine, yet casual/active style. Perfect for the rave, nightclub, pool party, or yoga.

Flowy Racerback—
Flowy, A-line body
3.5-ounce, 60/40 cotton/poly
40-singles sueded fine jersey
Self-fabric binding on neck and armholes
Click here for measurements.

White Pullover Sweatshirt
description:
Pullover Crewneck

The 5 color screen print consists of bright, neon green, fluorescent pink, glow blue, neon yellow, and black water based inks. These colors are extremely enhanced by UV lights at a rave or nightclub.
Classic, white crewneck pullover sweatshirt. 50/50 cotton+polyester blend. Preshrunk. Click here for size measurements

name:
ΓΔVΣ® Logo NewEra® Snapback
White+Pink Bubblegum
description:
Fancy

9FIFTY Snapback

The very popular New Era® flat bill adjustable cap. One size fits most. Made of 100% Cotton, Woven Adjustable, Structured, High Crown, Flat Bill. Each ΓΔVΣ® Logo is hand cut and sewn by the designer. The pink fuzzy letters measure 2.5" tall and span the full width of the structured crown. The letters look like bubblegum. Get it poppin' if you know what's good!
ΓΔVΣ® is a trademark of Acid Unicorn®.


The Design

The ΓΔVΣ® logo is hand crafted using two thick layers acrylic hat maker's felt. The appliqué is then stitched and cut by hand, individually. Soft, chunky letters and pink color way, reminds me of my favorite bubblegum. The polyester felt I use is made from recycled post-consumer plastic bottles, not animal fur.
These hats are very limited.
ΓΔVΣ® hats, are hand crafted with ultimate precision, and OCD attention to detail.
Please allow 7-10 business days.

name:
Minimal White Space
Men's Black T-Shirt
description:
Minimal White Space T-Shirt

Ironically, the monotone symmetry of the rectangular shape, somehow demands our attention, just long enough to wonder why. Individually screen printed by hand, using water based ink. The shirt is one of our signature ΓΔVΣ® brand, black t-shirts. Super soft, ring spun, pre-shrunk, comfortable, and tailored to a perfect fit. These t-shirts are the truth.
